html.p: You run to catch up with the men, who seem happy enough to share your company along the road. They are pilgrims, they say, heading for a northern temple to gain learning. They are quiet, hard-faced men and they soon return to their dirge-like chanting. However, they share a little food with you at the end of the day's walk, and you prepare to sleep out under the stars in this strange company. Test your Luck.
